DOC.brief_summary: To provide efficacy safety data two dos ( 0.5 mg 1.25 mg ) FTY720 Japanese patient relapse multiple sclerosis ( MS )
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety FTY720 Patients With Relapsing Multiple Sclerosis ( MS )
DOC.criteria: Male female patient aged 1860 Patients diagnosis multiple sclerosis Patients history presence chronic disease immune system MS Patients history presence malignancy , pulmonary heart disease , etc . Pregnant nursing ( lactate ) woman Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply
